questions.body: What is the aim of the PhenCode database?

snippets.text: VariSNP, a benchmark database for variations from dbSNP.
VariSNP datasets are selected from dbSNP.
These subsets were filtered against disease-related variants in the ClinVar, UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot, and PhenCode databases, to identify neutral or nonpathogenic cases.
Some previously developed datasets are available for this purpose, but newer and larger benchmark sets for benign variants have largely been missing.
The datasets will be updated with automated scripts on a regular basis and are freely available at http://structure.bmc.lu.se/VariSNP.
